Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Small Business

Items.Title: Oversight - Reintegration of Veterans into the Workforce and Small Business Community.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Reintegration of Veterans into the Workforce and Small Business Community.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Small Business

Resolution calling upon the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs (V.A.) to completely renovate and utilize the existing St. Albans Community Living Center to provide a full-service V.A. hospital with an emergency room, a primary and extended care facility for female veterans, and a comprehensive treatment facility with domiciliary for homeless veterans.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Department of Veterans Affairs (V.A.) to completely renovate and utilize the existing St. Albans Community Living Center.

Items.Title: Oversight - Reintegration of Veterans into the Workforce and Small Business Community.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Reintegration of Veterans into the Workforce and Small Business Community.
